Name: Old City of Sana'a
Description: Old City of Sana'a - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic city with distinctive multi-story mud-brick architecture.

Name: Old Walled City of Shibam
Description: Old Walled City of Shibam - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient city with the world's oldest skyscrapers made of mud brick.

Name: Historic Town of Zabid
Description: Historic Town of Zabid - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Medieval Islamic city with distinctive architecture.

Name: Socotra Archipelago
Description: Socotra Archipelago - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Unique island ecosystem with endemic flora and fauna.
